eligibility:
A Pass with 60% marks at +2 level in Science or Commerce stream with Mathematics or Statistics or Computer Science as one of the subjects from any Board of Education recognized by UGC/AIU are eligible to apply for this program.
Candidates writing the +2 examinations in March-May 2025 may apply with their class X and XI marks.
Students pursuing International curriculum must note that eligibility is according to AIU stipulations:
Applicants pursuing IB curriculum must have 3 HL and 3 SL with 24 credits. Applicants pursuing GCE / Edexcel must have a minimum of 3 A levels with a grade not less than C.
